content: https://www.foxbusiness.com/personal-finance/social-security-cuts-benefits-lossesWhen the Social Security fund is expected to become insolvent in 2033, the typical dual-income couple retiring that year would see an annual benefits cut of $17,400 in todayâ€™s dollars, the CFRB said in its analysis.i guess people not in the usa really don't care about this kind of rhetoric and i think people in the usa for the most part don't even believe it. some peoples entire social security benefits aren't even 17k though so it doesn't look too good for them.
